attributes.action: Support Investigation into whether the Covid 19 vaccines cause miscarriage
attributes.additional_details: We need the Govenment to support an investigation into whether there is a potential link between women losing their unborn child after taking a Covid 19 vaccine.
attributes.background: We need an investigation into whether there is a link between the Covid 19 vaccines and miscarriage, thousands of women are speaking out claiming they believe it caused them to lose their unborn child.
